enWisdom: The outside of the one who shows off is beautiful but his inside is sickly

Wisdom: اعْمَلُوا فِي غَيْرِ رِيَاءٍ وَلَا سُمْعَةٍ فَإِنَّهُ مَنْ يَعْمَلْ لِغَيْرِ اللَّهِ يَكِلْهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ إِلَى مَنْ عَمِلَ لَهُ
enWisdom: Work without seeking to show off or for the sake of renown, for indeed the one who works for other than Allah is left by Allah to the one whom he worked for
The smallest amount of showing off is polytheism
Verily the slightest showing off is polytheism
The bane of worship is showing off
Whoever enumerates his favours [on others] effaces his munificence

Wisdom: لَا تَعْمَلْ شَيْئاً مِنَ الْخَيْرِ رِيَاءً وَلَا تَتْرُكْهُ حَيَاءً
enWisdom: Do not perform any good action in order to show off and do not abandon it out of shame
With excessive disputation, there can be no affection
The smallest amount of showing off is polytheism
Showing off is [a form of] ascribing partners [to Allah]
